# bui-heading

The `bui-heading` web component is a customizable heading element that allows you to specify the level of the heading (ranging from 1 to 6). It provides a clear and structured way to display headings in your web application.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description               | Type     | Default                      |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------- | -------- | ---------------------------- |
| `level`  | `level`   | The level of the heading. | `number` | `1 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6` |

---

_Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)_
